turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright. This is the police front desk - what happened, and what item have you lost?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi I lost my wallet

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, you've lost your wallet. When did you last have it with you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'm not sure because I drunk at 4am

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, sounds like it was sometime around 4 a.m. after drinking. Where were you at that time do you remember the place or area you were in last?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Maybe near the Chinatown

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, near Chinatown. Do you remember which part - maybe a bar, a street, or a station around there?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Cheers bar

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks - Cheers Bar helps narrow it down. Could you describe what your wallet looks like?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Black and folded small wallet

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, a small black folded wallet. What items did you have inside it — cards, ID, cash?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Driver's license and two credit cards, 150 dollars bill

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, so you had your driver's licence, two credit cards, and about $150 in cash inside. Could you tell me the name on the ID so we can record it correctly in the report?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, sure I'm Ryota

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, Ryota, thanks. What's the best phone number for us to contact you if the wallet is turned in?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, got your number. When did you first notice the wallet was missing — was it this morning when you woke up?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I noticed when I woke up at

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, you realised it around . Have you had a chance to retrace your steps or contact Cheers Bar to see if anyone handed it in?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: No I haven't

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, no worries — it happens. Would you like me to file an official lost-property report for you now, or would you prefer to contact the bar first?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: I'd like you to file a lost-property report

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, l'll file the lost-property report for you now under your details. Is there anything else you'd like help with regarding the missing wallet?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Nothing thank you sir

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, thanks for reporting it — we'll contact you if it's turned in. Take care.
